import axios from'axios';var URL='https://nodwick-5197d7051295.herokuapp.com/';//Users
export var getUsers=function getUsers(){return axios.get("".concat(URL,"/users"));};//!!! Add direct route on back end for full list of users
export var getUser=function getUser(user_id){return axios.get("".concat(URL,"/users?user_id=").concat(user_id)).then(function(response){return response.data;});};export var getSingleUser=function getSingleUser(user_id){return axios.get("".concat(URL,"/users?user_id=").concat(user_id));};export var addUserToGame=function addUserToGame(game_id,user_id){return axios.patch("".concat(URL,"/users?game_id=").concat(game_id,"&user_id=").concat(user_id));};export var addUser=function addUser(user){return axios.post("".concat(URL,"/users"),user);};//Games
export var getGames=function getGames(){return axios.get("".concat(URL,"/games"));};export var addGame=function addGame(name){return axios.post("".concat(URL,"/games"),{name:name});};export var deleteGame=function deleteGame(game_id){return axios.delete("".concat(URL,"/games?game_id=").concat(game_id));};export var renameGame=function renameGame(name,game_id){return axios.patch("".concat(URL,"/games?game_id=").concat(game_id),{name:name});};//Locations 
export var getLocation=function getLocation(game_id,loc_id){return axios.get("".concat(URL,"/games/locations?game_id=").concat(game_id,"&loc_id=").concat(loc_id));};export var getLocations=function getLocations(game_id){return axios.get("".concat(URL,"/games/locations?game_id=").concat(game_id));};export var deleteLocation=function deleteLocation(game_id,loc_id){return axios.delete("".concat(URL,"/games/locations?game_id=").concat(game_id,"&loc_id=").concat(loc_id));};export var addNewLocation=function addNewLocation(data,game_id){return axios.post("".concat(URL,"/games/locations?game_id=").concat(game_id),data);};export var renameLocation=function renameLocation(name,game_id,loc_id){return axios.patch("".concat(URL,"/games/locations?game_id=").concat(game_id,"&loc_id=").concat(loc_id),{name:name});};//Items
export var getLocationItems=function getLocationItems(game_id,location_id){return axios.get("".concat(URL,"/games/locations/items?game_id=").concat(game_id,"&loc_id=").concat(location_id));};export var addNewItem=function addNewItem(item,game_id){var location_id=arguments.length>2&&arguments[2]!==undefined?arguments[2]:null;if(!location_id){return axios.post("".concat(URL,"/games/items?game_id=").concat(game_id),item);}else{return axios.post("".concat(URL,"/games/items?game_id=").concat(game_id,"&loc_id=").concat(location_id),item);}};export var deleteItem=function deleteItem(game_id,item_id){return axios.delete("".concat(URL,"/games/items?game_id=").concat(game_id,"&item_id=").concat(item_id));};export var moveItem=function moveItem(new_loc,game_id,loc_id,item_id){return axios.patch("".concat(URL,"/games/items/locations?game_id=").concat(game_id,"&loc_id=").concat(loc_id,"&item_id=").concat(item_id),{loc_id:new_loc});};export var changeItemFields=function changeItemFields(data,game_id,item_id){return axios.patch("".concat(URL,"/games/items?game_id=").concat(game_id,"&item_id=").concat(item_id),data);};
